TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ResourceWriter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Resources.IResourceWriter
Public NotInheritable Class ResourceWriter Implements IResourceWriter
public ref class ResourceWriter sealed : System::Resources::IResourceWriter
type ResourceWriter = class interface IResourceWriter interface IDisposable

summary.span: 將系統預設格式中的資源寫入輸出檔或輸出資料流。

span.span: Writes resources in the system-default format to an output file or an output stream.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的預設實作介面。 provides a default implementation of the interface. 它可讓您以程式設計方式建立二進位資源 (.resources) 檔。It enables you to programmatically create a binary resource (.resources) file. 資源會指定為名稱 / 值組使用方法。Resources are specified as name and value pairs using the method. 資源名稱會區分大小寫，用來進行查閱，但若要更輕鬆地支援撰寫工具和 bug，以避免將不允許只有大小寫不同的名稱的.resources 檔案。Resource names are case-sensitive when used for lookups, but to more easily support authoring tools and help eliminate bugs, will not allow a .resources file to have names that vary only by case. 類別可讓您建立的字串、 物件和二進位資源。The class enables you to create string, object, and binary resources. 二進位資源可以寫入資源檔做為位元組陣列或資料流。Binary resources can be written to the resource file as a byte array or a stream. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 若要建立的資源檔，建立唯一的檔案名稱，然後呼叫至少一次，呼叫寫入磁碟中的資源檔，然後呼叫關閉檔案。To create a resources file, create a with a unique file name, call at least once, call to write the resources file to disk, and then call to close the file. 呼叫會隱含地呼叫如果您未明確呼叫。Calling will implicitly call if you do not explicitly call . 資源不一定會寫入其已加入的順序相同。The resources will not necessarily be written in the same order they were added. 從所建立之二進位.resources 檔擷取資源類別，您可以使用類別，可讓您擷取具名的資源，或類別，可讓您列舉檔案中的所有資源。To retrieve resources from a binary .resources file created by the class, you can use the class, which lets you retrieve named resources, or the class, which lets you enumerate all the resources in the file. ## Examples 下列範例會將數個字串寫入至 myResources.resources 檔案。The following example writes several strings into the myResources.resources file. [!code-cpp[Classic ResourceWriter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ResourceWriter Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ResourceWriter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ResourceWriter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ResourceWriter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ResourceWriter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value` 必須可序列化。`value` must be serializable. 資源不會寫入到呼叫方法。The resource is not written until the method is called. 您可以擷取所撰寫的資源藉由呼叫的方法方法。You can retrieve the resources written by the method by calling the method. ## Examples 下列範例會使用的二進位.resources 檔案中加入物件資料的方法。The following example uses the method to add object data to a binary resources file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcewriter.addresource/cs/addresource_obj1.cs#1)] `DonorColumns` 是自訂類別的欄位包含要在使用者介面中顯示的資料行的名稱。`DonorColumns` is a custom class whose fields contain the names of columns to be displayed in the user interface. 請注意，類別標示有屬性。Note that the class is marked with the attribute. 一般情況下，類別會定義在個別的組件，並對它的參考會提供給編譯器在編譯時期。Ordinarily, the class would be defined in a separate assembly, and a reference to it would be provided to the compiler at compile time.

summary.span: 以資源加入要寫入之資源清單的資料單位。

span.span: Adds a unit of data as a resource to the list of resources to be written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將資源加入以二進位格式 (也就是為位元組陣列) 來寫入的資源清單。Use the method to add a resource in binary form (that is, as an array of bytes) to the list of resources to be written. 您必須指定資源的資源，以及資料本身的二進位表示法中包含的資料型別名稱的名稱。You must specify the name of the resource, the type name of the data contained in the resource, and the binary representation of the data itself. 您已新增您需要每個資源之後，請使用中所指定的方法來寫入的資源清單資源檔或資料流建構函式。After you have added each resource you require, use the method to write the list of resources to the resources file or stream that was specified in the constructor. `typeName` 是字串，表示資源的資料類型。`typeName` is a string that represents the data type of the resource. 它可以是下列值之一：It can be any of the following values: - 字串表示`ResourceTypeCode`列舉的成員，表示資源的資料類型。The string representation of a `ResourceTypeCode` enumeration member that indicates the data type of the resource. `ResourceTypeCode` 是私人的列舉型別，用來表示特殊的二進位格式用來儲存一種 19 一般的資料類型。`ResourceTypeCode` is a private enumeration that is used by to indicate that a special binary format is used to store one of 19 common data types. 這些包括.NET Framework 的基本資料型別 (， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， )，以及， ，和。These include the .NET Framework primitive data types (, , , , , , , , , , , , ), as well as , , and . 颾魤 ㄛ`ResourceTypeCode`列舉會包含下表中顯示的值。In addition, the `ResourceTypeCode` enumeration includes the values shown in the following table. |`ResourceTypeCode` 值`ResourceTypeCode` value|描述Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| |`ResourceTypeCode.ByteArray`|資料是一個位元組陣列。The data is a byte array.| |`ResourceTypeCode.Null`|資料為 null 參考。The data is a null reference.| |`ResourceTypeCode.Stream`|資料會儲存在資料流。The data is stored in a stream.| - 包含二進位資料會指派給型別的完整的名稱的字串`serializedData`引數 (例如`System.String`)。A string that contains the fully qualified name of the type whose binary data is assigned to the `serializedData` argument (for example, `System.String`). 此外，對於不屬於.NET Framework 類別庫的類型，字串包含名稱、 版本、 文化特性和公開金鑰組件包含型別。In addition, for types that are not part of the .NET Framework class library, the string includes the name, version, culture, and public key of the assembly that contains the type. 例如，下列字串，表示序列化的資料表示的執行個體`Person`輸入`Extensions`命名空間，在 1.0 版的名為 公用程式，都沒有公用的索引鍵和任何指定的文化特性的組件中找到。For example, the following string indicates that the serialized data represents an instance of the `Person` type in the `Extensions` namespace, which is found in version 1.0 of an assembly named Utility that has no public key and no designated culture. `Extensions.Person, Utility, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null` 讀取與寫入的資源資料的平行方法方法是。A parallel method for reading resource data written with the method is . ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來撰寫兩個整數值至.resources 檔案，然後再使用擷取它們的物件。The following example uses the method to write two integer values to a .resources file, and then uses a object to retrieve them. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResourceData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcewriter.addresourcedata/cs/addresourcedata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResourceData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcewriter.addresourcedata/vb/addresourcedata.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter Cstr1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter Cstr1 Example/CPP/resourcewritercstr1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter Cstr1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter Cstr1 Example/CS/resourcewritercstr1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceWriter Cstr1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter Cstr1 Example/VB/resourcewritercstr1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 允許使用者關閉資源檔或資料流，明確釋放資源。

span.span: Allows users to close the resource file or stream, explicitly releasing resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的實作是與相同。The implementation of this method is the same as . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法來寫入所有的資源物件中輸出資料流的類別。The following code example uses the method to write all resource objects in a class to the output stream. 程式碼然後關閉寫入器，並讓寫入器的資源可供其他處理序。The code then shuts down the writer and make the writer's resources available for other processes. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Dispose Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter.Dispose Example/CPP/resourcewriterdispose.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Dispose Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter.Dispose Example/CS/resourcewriterdispose.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Dispose Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter.Dispose Example/VB/resourcewriterdispose.vb#1)]

summary.span: 以系統預設格式儲存所有資源至輸出資料流。

span.span: Saves all resources to the output stream in the system default format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來隱含地呼叫方法如果它不由您的應用程式程式碼呼叫的方法。The method is called implicitly by the method if it is not called by your application code. 只能呼叫一次之後的所有呼叫,和進行了。 can only be called once, after all calls to and have been made. 如果發生例外狀況寫入資源時，輸出資料流將會關閉以避免寫入無效的資訊。If an exception occurs while writing the resources, the output stream will be closed to prevent writing invalid information. 不會關閉輸出資料流，正常情況下。 does not close the output stream in normal cases. 除非您會將額外的資料結合您的.resources 檔案，或需要存取資料流之後，您應該呼叫之後呼叫，或只是呼叫。Unless you are combining extra data with your .resources file or need access to the stream afterwards, you should call after calling , or simply call . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法來寫入所有的資源物件中輸出資料流的類別The following code example uses the method to write all resource objects in a class to the output stream [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example/CPP/resourcewritergenerate.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example/CS/resourcewritergenerate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example/VB/resourcewritergenerate.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定委派，這個委派可讓您使用完整組件名稱，撰寫以 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 之前的 .NET Framework 版本為目標的資源組件。

span.span: Gets or sets a delegate that enables resource assemblies to be written that target versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] by using qualified assembly names.
The type that is encapsulated by the delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 如果您以舊版.NET Framework 為目標，MSBuild 會設定這個屬性。 and MSBuild set this property if you target an earlier version of the .NET Framework.
